content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. I'm glad you like the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I offer 400 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Wang, but 400 Euro per month is too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, I will increase my offer to 450 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. While 450 Euro per month is better, I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I increase my offer to 480 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. 480 Euro per month is a better offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I offer 500 Euro per month now.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. 500 Euro per month is a good offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I increase my offer to 520 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you, Mr. Wang. 520 Euro per month is a good offer, but I am still looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
